ai-tha-ap169:1.1_0: “One from the bank of the river,
ai-tha-ap169:1.4_0: Like a freshly blossoming sal tree
ai-tha-ap169:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap169:3.2_0: it was all over the flower.
ai-tha-ap169:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap169:4.1_0: Seven measures have been strayed for seven eons.
ai-tha-ap169:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pūraṇasī.
ai-tha-ap169:7.1_0: took the seventh Coral Tree flowers,
